text:
MANGARAJ BEHARI Chanduli, 42 Mouza Cuttack, Odisha, India, Mobile. No: <PHONE>, <PHONE> E-Mail: <EMAIL>
Career Objectives -
To excel in a challenging work environment in the field of building construction and maintenance, that utilizes my skills to the maximum extent and helps the organization to achieve its goals.
Profile Summary-
Course completed - Diploma in Mechanical engineering Total 3+ yrs experiences (02. years after Diploma) in plumbing execution & plumbing maintenance works. I have worked with two companies one is Sobha Developers Limited Bangalore & another one is Engineering Maintenance Company (EMCO-ETA ASCON GROUP) Dubai. In Dubai I am working at DAFZA of Dubai International Airport as a plumbing technician and in India I was working at Sobha Amethyst project Bangalore. Key Skills-
Mechanical Engineering.
Technical ideas/methods
Capable of problem solving.
Quick learning
Great communication skills
Software Skills
MS Dos, Office excel, E-mail and net
Employment & Project Details-
1.Sobha Developers Limited (Bangalore)  Duration: Sept 2011 to Dec 2013 (full time)
 Project Name: <NAME> Designation: Plumbing Technician
 Total Area: 80 acres.
 Total No of Villas: 346 Villas.
2.EMCO –ETA ASCON GROUP (Dubai, UAE )
 Duration: From May2015 to Continuing……
 Project Name: <NAME>(Dubai Free zone Authority)
 Designation: Plumbing Technician Roles and Responsibilities-
Proper punctual and sincere on duty.
Attending complain at site through call centre of site office.
Attend complain depend on its requirement/urgency and repaired it.
Proper tools maintain in tool box at own site.
Checking and doing maintenance of all the instruments such as PRV,NRV, Butterfly valve, gate valve and others by time to time
Checking all the parameters like water meter reading ,water level of chemical tank and water tank.
Attending different types of complain of W.C flushing , W.C hose with trigger gun and wash basin mixer and of others, repaired it in time.
Daily update work order as per attending the complain and report it to Engineer.
Maintain requirement of material and fittings as per job and issued it from the store.
Checking water leak inside the toilet or from selling or from any other places at site and repaired it.
Proper communicate with client and convinced them to solve the problem with their satisfaction .
Attend TBT and safety meeting at site through proper channel.In any emergency such as fire, heavy water leak or any other incident related to job on duty at site immediate
informed to Engineer or to Project Manager.
Maintaining proper discipline at site.
Strengths-
Self determined & Achievement Oriented
Honesty, Hard working, Coordinating, Sincere.

10th under board of secondary education Orissa with aggregate 65% marks.
Diploma in Mechanical engineering from NILACHAL POLYTECHNIC under SCTE&VT Odisha with
aggregate 68% marks.
B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering continuing 3rd year at VITS Engineering College under
